footerText: © {{year}} The Art of Healing. All rights reserved.
heroTitle: A Sacred Encounter with Ancestral Medicines
heroSubtitle: Discover how Ayahuasca can transform your life, bringing you clarity, emotional healing, and a renewed connection with the universe. Join us in this transformative experience, where tradition meets expert guidance for an unforgettable journey.
contactDescription: Questions? We're here to help you on your journey.
whatIsAyahuascaDescription: Ayahuasca is a sacred Amazonian brew, used by shamans in healing ceremonies. Composed of two plants, the Ayahuasca vine (Banisteriopsis caapi) and Chacruna leaves (Psychotria viridis), it induces expanded states of consciousness, facilitating deep introspection and spiritual cleansing.
howAyahuascaWorksDescription: It acts on physical, emotional, and spiritual levels. The DMT from Chacruna, activated by the vine, allows access to deep dimensions of the psyche, revealing unconscious patterns, healing traumas, and connecting with a higher wisdom. It is a journey of self-discovery and purification.
spiritualMasterDescription: Ayahuasca is considered a teacher that instructs through visions and reflections. It is not a recreational hallucinogen, but a powerful tool for personal growth, demanding respect, intention, and proper guidance. Each ceremony is a unique opportunity to learn and heal.
ayahuascaBenefitClarityDescription: Release blockages and negative patterns, providing a new perspective on your life and purpose.
ayahuascaBenefitHealingDescription: Allows you to confront and heal past wounds in a safe and contained environment.
ayahuascaBenefitConnectionDescription: Expand your consciousness and strengthen your connection with nature, the universe, and your essential self.
groupCeremonyDescription: A space for collective healing where the group's energy enhances the experience. Ideal for sharing and learning in a community.
privateCeremonyDescription: An intimate and personalized experience, tailored to your specific needs. Perfect for deep and focused work.
guidesSubtitle: Meet those who will accompany you on this sacred journey. Each of our guides brings deep wisdom, experience, and an unwavering commitment to your well-being and transformation.
guide_desc_wilson_alfaro: Spiritual guide with a deep connection to Amazonian traditions. Trained in the Peruvian Amazon, Wilson Alfaro brings an ancestral understanding of Ayahuasca and its healing power. His experience facilitates a safe and trustworthy space for personal exploration.
guide_desc_jacob: Spiritual master trained in the Peruvian Amazon, where he learned the sacred use of ancestral medicine directly from healers. With a serene and profound presence, he guides ceremonies at Casa Trinitos (Guanacaste), where he accompanies transformation processes.
guide_desc_harley: Specialist in medical care and first aid, with experience in guided meditations and therapeutic massages. Her calm and professional presence ensures a safe environment throughout the ceremony, providing confidence and support to both the team and the participants.
guide_desc_johanna: Guardian of the medicine trained in the Peruvian Amazon. Providing ceremonies in Colombia and Costa Rica, her presence brings security, support, and balance between the physical and spiritual, upholding the ceremonial space with firmness, care, and a deep connection to female healing.
defaultContributionText: You can reserve your spot with 20%

exploreMedicineDescription: Discover the secrets and wisdom of Ayahuasca, an ancestral medicine that opens the doors to healing and consciousness.
exploreGuidesDescription: Meet the dedicated people who will accompany you on your journey, offering support, experience, and a safe space for your transformation.
contactCommunityText: Follow our social media and join our community to stay updated on our upcoming events and exclusive content.
allCeremoniesSubtitle: Explore our upcoming and past ceremonies. Each is a unique opportunity for healing and growth.
noUpcomingCeremonies: There are no upcoming ceremonies at this time. Check back soon!
loginSubtext: Sign in to continue your healing journey.
googleSuccessDescription: You have successfully signed in with Google.
registerSubtext: Join our community to access exclusive content.
registerSuccessDescription: We've sent you a verification email.
emailUpdatedSuccess: Email updated. Please verify your new address.
passwordRequired: Password is required for this action.
errorCountryCodeRequired: Please select a country code if you enter a phone number.
notFoundDescription: The page you are looking for does not exist or has been moved.
fullPlanUpTo: Full plan for up to 2 people
guidesPageSubtitle: Dedicated individuals who hold a safe and sacred space for your transformation.
deleteGuideConfirmDescription: This action cannot be undone. This will permanently delete the guide.
preparationGuideFullSubtitle: Preparation is key to a deep and transformative experience. Follow this guide to align your body, mind, and spirit.
preparationProcessDescription: The ceremony is a journey. It begins with a clear intention, you surrender to the experience, and it ends with integrating what you've learned.
ceremonyProcessDescription: A guided sacred ritual where music, silence, and medicine come together to facilitate your healing process.
experienceProcessDescription: Every journey is unique. You may experience visions, intense emotions, and a deep connection with your inner self.
integrationProcessDescription: After the ceremony, we help you process and apply the teachings in your daily life for lasting change.
dietSubtitle: A clean diet before the ceremony purifies the body and sensitizes the spirit.
allowedFoodsList:
- Fresh fruits and vegetables.
- Whole grains (rice, quinoa).
- Legumes and pulses.
- Grilled or steamed fish.
- Water and herbal teas.
prohibitedFoodsList:
- Red meat and pork.
- Processed or fried foods.
- Dairy and aged cheeses.
- Alcohol and caffeine.
- Refined sugars and spicy foods.
mentalPrepSubtitle: Intention is the compass for your journey. Dedicate time to reflection and meditation.
meditationDescription: Practice meditation to calm the mind and open the heart. Stillness is the canvas for revelation.
intentionsDescription: Set a clear intention. What are you looking to heal, understand, or transform? Clarity enhances the medicine.
reflectionDescription: Write your thoughts and emotions in a journal. Self-exploration begins before the ceremony.
emotionalHealingDescription: Ayahuasca can bring suppressed emotions to the surface. Be prepared to embrace them without judgment, allowing them to flow and be released. It is an act of deep self-compassion and healing.
whatToBringTitle: What to Bring to the Ceremony
comfortItemsList:
- Comfortable and warm clothing (in layers).
- Blanket and pillow.
- Yoga mat or pad.
essentialsList:
- Water bottle.
- Flashlight (with red light if possible).
- Journal and pen for notes.
preparationCtaDescription: Prepare for a transformative experience. Our complete guide will help you align body, mind, and spirit for the ceremony.
authRequiredJourneyDescription: To access this personalized guide, please sign in or create an account. It's the first step on your path of preparation.
authRequiredCeremoniesDescription: To view all our ceremonies and reserve your spot, please sign in or create an account.
authRequiredDescription: You must be logged in to perform this action.
questionnaireMedicalConditions: Do you have any pre-existing medical conditions (heart problems, high blood pressure, etc.)?
questionnaireMedicalConditionsDesc: Your safety is our priority. Knowing your health status allows us to take better care of you.
questionnaireMedication: Are you currently taking any medication (including antidepressants, anxiolytics, or supplements)?
questionnaireMedicationDesc: This is crucial to know to avoid interactions.
questionnaireMedicationDetails: Please detail the medications and dosage.
questionnaireMentalHealth: Do you have a history of mental health conditions (depression, anxiety, psychosis, etc.)?
questionnaireMentalHealthDesc: This information helps us create a suitable supportive space for you.
questionnaireExperience: Do you have previous experience with Ayahuasca or other medicinal plants?
questionnaireExperienceDesc: This helps us understand your level of familiarity with the process.
questionnaireIntention: What is your main intention for this ceremony?
questionnaireIntentionDesc: Define what you are looking to heal or understand. A clear intention is the compass for your journey.
questionnaireIntentionPlaceholder: e.g., I seek to heal a past wound, find my purpose, connect with my spirituality...
myQuestionnaireAnswersDescription: These are the answers you provided. You can review them at any time.
noAnswersSubmitted: You have not submitted your answers yet.
questionnaireErrorDescription: We could not save your answers. Please try again.
pleaseCompleteThisStep: Please complete this step before continuing.
preparationCompleteDescription: You have completed the preparation guide. You are one step closer to your healing journey.
aiGuideDescription: Continue your preparation with additional resources.
aiGuideContent: Our AI guide is here to answer your questions, and our video courses delve deeper into preparation and integration. Explore them to enrich your journey.

exportDataDescription: Download a full backup of all application data in JSON format.
importDataDescription: Restore the application from a JSON backup file. This will overwrite all existing data.
importWarningDescription: You are about to overwrite all application data with the contents of the selected file. An automatic backup will be created before importing.
importSuccessDescription: The data has been restored correctly.
rollbackCardDescription: An automatic backup was created before your last import. You can undo the changes by restoring this backup.
rollbackWarningDescription: Are you sure you want to undo the last import? This will restore the data to the state it was in before you imported the file.
rollbackSuccessDescription: The data has been restored to its previous state.
resetCountersConfirmDescription: This will reset the view and click counters for this ceremony to zero.

themeUpdateReload: The page will reload to apply the changes.
